    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Caretaker<T>
    The `Caretaker` interface defines the contract for managing mementos in the Memento design pattern.
    CaretakerImpl<T>
    Implementation of the Caretaker interface for managing a list of mementos in the Memento design pattern.
    Command
    Represents a command in the text editing engine.
    CommandImpl
    Base class for all command implementations in the editor.
    Copy
    Command to copy the currently selected text in the editor.
    Cut
    Command to cut the currently selected text in the editor.
    Deletion
    Command to delete the currently selected text or content in the editor.
    Engine
    Main API for the text editing engine
    EngineController
    REST controller for handling editor engine-related API endpoints.
    EngineDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing the state of the editor engine.
    EngineImpl
     
    EngineInvoker
    The `EngineInvoker` class is responsible for executing commands on the editor engine.
    EngineService
    Service layer for managing operations on the editor engine.
    EngineServiceTest
     
    Insertion
    Command to insert text into the editor at the current cursor position.
    Memento<T>
    Represents a Memento in the Memento design pattern.
    MementoImpl
    Implementation of the Memento interface for the editor engine state.
    Originator<T>
    Represents the Originator in the Memento design pattern.
    OriginatorImpl
    Implementation of the Originator interface for managing the state of an EngineImpl.
    Paste
    Command to paste the content of the clipboard into the editor at the current cursor position.
    Selection
    Command to set or modify the selection in the editor.
    Selection
    Provides access to selection control operations
    SelectionDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a text selection in the editor.
    SelectionImpl
    Implementation of the Selection interface for managing text selection within a buffer.
    TextEditor
    The main class for the Text Editor application.
